mapper.select: select cart.id, cart.customerId, cart.storeId, cart.goodsId, cart.num, cart.price, cart.total, store.name as storeName, goods.name as goodsName from cart left join store on cart.storeid = store.id left join goods on cart.goodsid = goods.id where customerId=#{customerId}
mapper.update: update cart set num = #{num}, total = #{total} where id = #{id}
